item.title: My First Post
item.description: After spending too much time talking to myself, I finally took the initiative to start blogging. The biggest force blocking me from taking this step was the lack of intention. What would I blog about? Why should I consider my own thoughts important to be shared? Those, and some other questions, bogged me down for a long, long time. It was only yesterday, after facing a huge announcement from my partner Dominique, that I was able to gather my strenght and take the first step.
